title: It's Finally Time for 8K
description: Between 8K and Rollable OLED LG has some really cool stuff at CES 2019. LG SIGNATURE TV R (AKA Rollable OLED TV):  LG OLED TV 8K, model Z9:  LG NanoCell TV 8K, Model SM9900:  LG Sound Bar, model SL9Y:  LG gram, 14:   LG gram, 17:  LG Projector HU85L:  XBOOM  portable speakers PK 3:  PK 5:  PK 7:  LG AI first-home UX of LG TV webOS 4.5 Platform :   Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
